buildings.name: Ra's prayer
buildings.description: Building that allows you to unlock build statues to the gods.

buildings.name: Hiding place
buildings.description: Building that allows you to hide resources when you are attacked.

buildings.name: Tomb
buildings.description: Allows you to revive lost troops.

buildings.name: Osiris's prayer
buildings.description: Building that allows you to upgrade troops (slaves and camels).

buildings.name: Hatshepsut temple
buildings.description: Allows you to create defensive troops (mummies).

buildings.name: Temple of Edfu
buildings.description: Building that allows you to strengthen defense against spies.

buildings.name: Slave dormitories
buildings.description: Building that allows you to create new troops (slaves).

buildings.name: Camel drinker
buildings.description: Building that allows you to create new troops (camels).

buildings.name: Anubis' avatar
buildings.description: Allows you to recruit avatars of the ten Anubis. This avatar has the functionality to defend.

buildings.name: Thot's avatar
buildings.description: Allows you to recruit avatars of the god Thot. It is the fastest traveling troop.

buildings.name: Bastet's avatar
buildings.description: Allows you to recruit avatars of the ten Bastet. This avatar has the functionality to spy on enemies.

buildings.name: Isis's avatar
buildings.description: Allows you to recruit ten ISIS avatars. It is the troop with the most attack.

buildings.name: Ra's avatar
buildings.description: Allows you to recruit avatars of the ten Ra. This avatar has the functionality to conquer other zones.
